definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The riveter riveted the metal sheets to the ship's bottom.
sentences.chinese: 鉚工把薄金屬板鉚在船底上。

sentences.english: The worker bedded metal plates together.
sentences.chinese: 工人把幾塊金屬板平放在一起。

sentences.english: But excludes sheet metal working machinery and metal-forming and forging machines.
sentences.chinese: 但不包括金屬板加工機，金屬成形機與鍛壓機。

sentences.english: These electrons will not pass into the phototube because of the insulation on the metal plate.
sentences.chinese: 由於金屬板上有絕緣層，這些電子不能進入光電管。

sentences.english: A machine for bending and folding sheet metal.
sentences.chinese: 但不包括金屬板加工機，金屬成形機與鍛壓機。

sentences.english: This metal plate is exposed to light and creates an image which is then transferred to paper.
sentences.chinese: 這種金屬板在曝光後可以產生能被轉移到紙上的圖像。

sentences.english: Large metal top plate of brass and steel lamination provides more active magnetic area.
sentences.chinese: 大型金屬板頂的黃銅和鋼層壓提供了更多的主動磁區。

sentences.english: The contact tube and bracket with a piece of wood or soft metal plate pad.
sentences.chinese: 管子與支架接觸處用木塊或軟金屬板墊好。

sentences.english: The stripped facade is comprised of low-cost standing seam metal panels in a variety of colors.
sentences.chinese: 條狀的立面是由各種顏色的低成本設縫金屬板組成。

sentences.english: This effect is independent of the capacitance change between the plate and terminals.
sentences.chinese: 這種效應和金屬板與端子之間的電容變化無關。

sentences.english: Barn A is clad in corrugated metal and serves as the operations office and workspace for the farm.
sentences.chinese: 農舍A覆以摺疊金屬板，作爲農場的辦公室和工作間。

sentences.english: Even the sunlight in Britain is strong enough to heat water in pipes behind the metal plates.
sentences.chinese: 即使在英國，陽光也足以加熱金屬板背面水管裏的水。

sentences.english: As the district attorney paced, the men cut through the first layer of metal. Nothing.
sentences.chinese: 地方檢查官踱着步子，警員們鋸開第一層金屬板。

sentences.english: Moistened pasteboard or cloth was inserted between each disc.
sentences.chinese: 每塊金屬板中間嵌進溼紙板或布料。

sentences.english: Sieve trays are simply metal plates with holes in them.
sentences.chinese: 篩板塔盤就是簡單的帶孔金屬板。

sentences.english: The surfaces of metal plates were made by peening with glass spheres and planer.
sentences.chinese: 金屬板的表面粗糙度通過噴砂和刨牀加工控制。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
cord fabric used in vehicle tires
